dashboard.subtitle: Your last psychosocial risk score: {{score}} ‚Äî Keep up the great work!
dashboard.subtitleNew: Start your NOM-035 assessment to identify psychosocial risk factors
dashboard.startAssessmentDesc: Complete a comprehensive NOM-035 psychosocial risk assessment
dashboard.noScoreYet: No risk score yet. Complete your first assessment to see your score here.
dashboard.noAssessmentsYet: No assessments yet. Your completed assessments will appear here.
dashboard.tipHydrationDesc: Drink at least 8 glasses of water daily for optimal health
dashboard.tipActiveDesc: Aim for 30 minutes of physical activity each day
dashboard.tipSleepDesc: Get 7-8 hours of quality sleep every night

assessment.title: NOM-035 Assessment
assessment.subtitle: Select the assessment type based on your company size
assessment.guide1Desc: Identification of workers exposed to severe traumatic events
assessment.guide2Desc: Identification and analysis of psychosocial risk factors
assessment.guide3Desc: Comprehensive identification and analysis of psychosocial risk factors and organizational environment evaluation
assessment.answerRequired: Please answer this question to continue
assessment.startNewAssessment: Or start a new assessment manually
assessment.uploadDescription: Upload an Excel file with completed responses. You can edit and complete missing questions after import.
assessment.partialImportSuccess: Partial import successful. You can complete missing questions on the next screen.
assessment.importSuccess: Import successful! All questions have been answered.
assessment.needTemplate: Don't have a file? Download our template:
assessment.reviewSubtitle: Review, edit, and complete imported responses before generating the report
assessment.missingQuestionsAlert: There are unanswered questions. You can edit them or continue to the report.

report.title: Your NOM-035 Report
report.subtitle: Review your assessment and download your report
report.disclaimer: This report is automatically generated based on NOM-035-STPS-2018. It is recommended to consult with an occupational health specialist for complete interpretation of results and design of specific interventions.

upload.title: Upload Assessment
upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your Excel file here, or click to browse
